options.lingsTweaks.minWidth.name: Minimum window width
options.lingsTweaks.minWidth.desc: Sets the minimum width of the game window.
options.lingsTweaks.minHeight.name: Minimum window height
options.lingsTweaks.minHeight.desc: Sets the minimum height of the game window
options.lingsTweaks.alwaysShowHeadInTabO: Always show player head in tab overlay
options.lingsTweaks.blockPossibleCrashPa: Block packets that may crash the game directly
Send chat message when blocked a packet
options.lingsTweaks.blockPacketChatConte: The content of the chat message
Place '%s' at where the backend message formats
options.lingsTweaks.playerGlow.name: Make me glow!
options.lingsTweaks.dontSitOnMe.name: Don't sit on me!
options.lingsTweaks.dontSitOnMe.desc: Sends fake sneak packet when you got a passenger
